actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to decrease from 250,000 to 150,000 the number of veterans and other eligible persons in a State for which the Secretary of Labor assigns an assistant veterans' employment representative to such State.

summary.text: Decreases from 250,000 to 150,000 the number of veterans and other eligible persons in a State for which the Secretary of Labor assigns an assistant veterans' employment representative to such State.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to decrease from 250,000 to 150,000 the number of veterans and other eligible persons in a State for which the Secretary of Labor assigns an assistant veterans' employment representative to such State.
